IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE EDUCATION TO PRE K THRU 9TH GRADE DAY AND BOARDING SCHOOL STUDENTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE EDUCATION TO PRE K THRU 9TH GRADE DAY AND BOARDING SCHOOL STUDENTS.
IRS990.Desc: BASIC PROGRAM SERVICE ACTIVITIES INCLUDING SCHOOL AND EDUCATION PROGRAMS FOR APPROXIMATELY 168 STUDENTS IN GRADES 5-9, AND APPROXIMATELY 60 STUDENTS IN GRADES PK-4. THIS INCLUDES BOTH DAY AND BOARDING STUDENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED TO PAY FOR THE EXPENSES RELATED TO THE EDUCATIONAL PURPOSE OF THE ORGANIZATION.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.NonCashAssistanceDesc: REDUCTION OF TUITION COST CHARGED TO STUDENT

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAINTAINS A FINANCIAL AID COMMITTEE OF FIVE INDIVIDUALS, INCLUDING THE HEAD OF SCHOOL, DIRECTOR OF ADMISSIONS, ASSOCIATE DIRECTOR OF ADMISSIONS, CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER, AND DIRECTOR OF FINANCIAL AID/CONTROLLER. THE COMMITTEE REVIEWS ALL FINANCIAL AID APPLICATIONS ON AN ANNUAL BASIS TO DETERMINE AWARDS, UTILIZING TAX RETURNS, SSS APPLICATIONS, AND PARENT INTERVIEWS. FINANCIAL AID AWARDS ARE BASED ON NEED.

THE FORMER HEAD OF SCHOOL AND HIS FAMILY RESIDED, AS A CONDITION OF EMPLOYMENT, IN THE HEAD OF SCHOOL'S HOUSE AT 211 INDIAN MOUNTAIN ROAD, THE SCHOOL PROPERTY. THE SCHOOL PAID FOR HOUSEKEEPING SERVICES FOR THE FORMER HEAD OF SCHOOL'S RESIDENCE. AT THE SCHOOL'S REQUEST, THE FORMER HEAD OF SCHOOL WAS A MEMBER OF THE LOCAL COUNTRY CLUB, NORFOLK COUNTRY CLUB.
PLEASE REFER TO THE SCHEDULE O SUPPLEMENTAL INFORMATION TO FORM 990, PART VI, LINE 15 EXPLANATION.

SEVERANCE PAYMENTS WERE MADE TO MARK A. DEVEY, FORMER HEAD OF SCHOOL, IN THE AMOUNT OF $70,000. THE AMOUNT WAS PAID DURING CALENDAR YEAR 2015, BUT THE EXPENSE WAS INCURRED DURING FISCAL YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2015.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ELECT THEIR OWN OFFICERS AND VOTE ON THE INDUCTION OF NEW TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PRIOR TO FILING THE FORM 990, A COPY OF THE COMPLETED FORM WILL BE REVIEWED BY THE HEAD OF SCHOOL AND THE FINANCE COMMITTEE (A SUB COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES). ANY FEEDBACK WILL BE DISCUSSED AND REVIEWED WITH THE PREPARERS, AND THE FINAL FORM 990 WILL BE FILED. SUBSEQUENTLY, THE CFO WILL DISTRIBUTE A COPY OF THE COMPLETED FILING TO THE ENTIRE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES CIRCULATES ITS CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. ALL TRUSTEES ARE THEN REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST AND ALSO SIGN THEIR ACKNOWLEDGMENT OF THE POLICY ANNUALLY IN SEPTEMBER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION OF THE HEAD OF SCHOOL, THE SCHOOL'S TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIAL, IS DETERMINED BY THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE MADE UP OF INDEPENDENT MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, INCLUDING THE PRESIDENT AND VICE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD. THEIR PROCESS INCLUDES COMMUNICATION WITH AN INDEPENDENT CONSULTANT WHO IS KNOWLEDGEABLE ABOUT THE COMPENSATION OF HEADS OF SIMILAR SCHOOLS, A REVIEW OF THE HEAD'S JOB PERFORMANCE, A REVIEW OF INFORMATION ABOUT COMPENSATION OF HEADS OF SIMILAR SCHOOLS FOUND IN THEIR RESPECTIVE 990'S, CONSIDERATION OF PERCENT RAISES GIVEN TO OTHER EMPLOYEES OF THE SCHOOL, AND CONSIDERATION OF THE SCHOOL'S OVERALL FINANCIAL STATUS. THE COMPENSATION OF THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER IS SET BY THE HEAD OF SCHOOL. THE HEAD CONSIDERS A REVIEW OF HER JOB PERFORMANCE, A REVIEW OF INFORMATION FROM THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS ABOUT CFO COMPENSATION, PERCENT RAISES GIVEN TO OTHER EMPLOYEES OF THE SCHOOL, AND CONSIDERATION OF THE SCHOOL'S OVERALL FINANCIAL STATUS WHEN SETTING HER SALARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON REQUEST FROM THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER, CHERYL SLEBODA, IN THE BUSINESS OFFICE.
